snippet.title: Battle Brothers Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Battle Brothers released on the 24th of March 2017.

Battle Brothers is a turn based strategy RPG mix which has you leading a mercenary company in a gritty, low-power, medieval fantasy world. You decide where to go, whom to hire or to fight, what contracts to take and how to train and equip your men in a procedurally generated open world campaign.

Get the Game on Steam: http://store.steampowered.com/app/365360

Learn more on our website: http://battlebrothersgame.com/

Music by Breakdown Epiphanies: https://soundcloud.com/breakdownepiphanies

Follow us on twitter: https://twitter.com/OverhypeStudios

Like us on Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/overhypestudios

All press related info and materials: http://www.battlebrothersgame.com/Press/presskit/sheet.php?p=battle_brothers
